variants.Description in input context: c.1234A>T, causing frameshift and premature stop codon.

Material used.Description: Patient-derived fibroblasts were used in the RT-qPCR analysis.

Readout description.Result Description: RT-qPCR revealed a 60% reduction in *SMN1* transcript levels for the variant NM_000334.4:c.1234A>T.

Basic positive control.Description: A cell line expressing wild-type SMN protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to determine statistical significance.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Transcript levels comparable to wild type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Transcript levels reduced by more than 60% relative to wild type.

Material used.Description: Patient-derived fibroblasts were used in the Western blot analysis.

Readout description.Result Description: Western blot showed a corresponding decrease in SMN protein expression in cells carrying the variant (approximately 40% compared to controls).

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned for Western blot.

Basic positive control.Description: A cell line expressing wild-type SMN protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to determine statistical significance.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein levels comparable to wild type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein levels reduced by more than 60% relative to wild type.
